content: mosaic сrochet squares fast links to the charts january february march april may june july august september october november december what this course is about in this tutorial i have collected different types of mosaic squares each square is unique fascinating and at the same time easy to perform because the technique used here is mosaic crochet do you like working with color and pattern but don t want to mess with a million different threads then mosaic technique is what you need each square is marked with its own month just to avoid confusion mosaic сrochet squares 1 key technical points and designations each square starts the same way and has the same sequence of actions on the corners i show these moments in the video so that you will definitely succeed i ve made english subs https //www youtube com/watch v=h_hli_moyau&ab_channel=poufpeople for each square you will find a pattern and a chart below you can download the chart to enlarge it how to work with the chart che charts just click on the each chart to open it in pdf and download it january mosaic сrochet squares 2 february march mosaic сrochet squares 3 april may mosaic сrochet squares 4 june july august mosaic сrochet squares 5 september october mosaic сrochet squares 6 november december thank you thank you very much for purchasing this training course i hope you have had a lot of fun and useful information if you have any questions please contact me mosaic сrochet squares 7 julia gendina @poufpeople www poufpeople ru www youtube ru/poufpeople https //t me/ugendina join me website юлия гендина мастер-классы по вязанию крючком привет меня зовут юлия гендина я занимаюсь интерьерным вязанием -
